name: Hypogean
description:
Hypogean is a relaxed digging simulation which takes place in a neon, sci-fi underground city named Hypogea. The player is hired as the newest miner of Hypogea, an expert in wielding the so called “drilling machine.”

Your goal is to mine ores, return them to the city, turn them in for cash, upgrade your drilling machine, and then repeat. Plain and simple. Hypogea corporation offers a wide variety of upgrades to your machinery, so that your mining endeavors become much more enjoyable, efficient, and interesting.

Explore different underground biomes, hypogean biotopes.
Find hidden and forgotten Driller Parts that previous miners left behind.
Unearth ancient valuables covered under tons of dirt and rock.

Key Features Of The Game:
- Explore a variety of cave biomes.



- Discover and excavate different kind of ores.



- Combine ores to create different kind of alloys and metals.



- Sell your findings for money to upgrade your driller.



- Customize your driller to your liking with cosmetics you find in the caves.
